patterns_discovered: Dynamic search and filtering of companies
Nested state management for complex form interactions
Conditional rendering based on component state
gotchas_discovered: Managing multiple interaction modes (view, edit, add)
Complex state synchronization between props and local state

approach_outcome.description: Created CompanySelector component for company affiliation
key_achievements: Added role input with character limit

recommendations: Consider extracting some complex logic into custom hooks
Add prop types validation with PropTypes or TypeScript
Implement unit and integration tests for component
Add accessibility attributes for better screen reader support
Consider internationalization for error messages and labels
